scripts.clean:powershell: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'tests_output') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'tests_output' }; if (Test-Path 'screenshots') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'screenshots' }; if (Test-Path 'nightwatch-html-report') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'nightwatch-html-report' }"
scripts.test:clean: npm run clean && npm run test
